page.title: 11BURTON CARNIVAL
page.content: Every summer Highburton and Kirkburton join together to celebrate Burton Carnival. There is a procession of decorated trucks and people in fancy dress. On Saturday morning we decorated the float and put a comfy base on it ready for the afternoon procession. Later on we put on our new clothes and paraded through the village to the field where I, Rachel Cruise was crowned Carnival Queen 1985 by Lisa Mayor who was Carnival Queen 1984. I wore a pretty long white dress a long blue cloak and a crown. At the Carnival field there are stalls and events like the crowning of the Queen, a fancy dress parade and the brass band playing. I presented people with money for the best fancy dress costumes and trophies for the best decorated floats. It was a very enjoyable day.
